description:
Harry Styles's new album 'Kiss All The Time. Disco, Occasionally' is scheduled to be released on March 6, 2026.

This market will resolve according to the debut week sales for Harry Styles's album 'Kiss All The Time. Disco, Occasionally', according to Hits Daily Double.

If the album 'Kiss All The Time. Disco, Occasionally' has not been released by April 30, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to the lowest bracket.

If the album’s debut week sales fall exactly between two brackets, this market will resolve to the higher bracket.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the "HITS TOP 50" list found at https://hitsdailydouble.com/sales_plus_streaming, specifically, the figure in the column titled "Activity", once the results are finalized for the album’s debut week. If this resolution source becomes permanently unavailable, another credible resolution source may be chosen.

events.title: Harry Styles 'Kiss All The Time. Disco, Occasionally' First Week Album Sales?

question: Will 'Kiss All The Time. Disco, Occasionally' - Harry Styles debut week album sales be at least 550k?
